query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `unified_webhook_configs` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
	`user_id` int NOT NULL,
	`name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`channel_type` enum('slack','teams','discord','custom') NOT NULL,
	`webhook_url` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
	`slack_channel` varchar(100),
	`slack_username` varchar(100),
	`slack_icon_emoji` varchar(50),
	`teams_title` varchar(200),
	`teams_theme_color` varchar(10),
	`custom_headers` json,
	`custom_body_template` text,
	`events` json,
	`production_line_ids` json,
	`workstation_ids` json,
	`product_codes` json,
	`min_severity` enum('info','minor','major','critical') DEFAULT 'major',
	`rate_limit_minutes` int DEFAULT 5,
	`last_notified_at` timestamp NULL,
	`is_active` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`total_notifications_sent` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`last_success_at` timestamp NULL,
	`last_error_at` timestamp NULL,
	`last_error_message` text,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_unified_webhook_user` ON `unified_webhook_configs` (`user_id`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_unified_webhook_type` ON `unified_webhook_configs` (`channel_type`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_unified_webhook_active` ON `unified_webhook_configs` (`is_active`);
